Nightstrike::

The short circuit struke to Nightstrike and it helped to half-awake 
him. the electricity did that several of his circuits were damaged, 
with out help that injuries could do Nigtstrike's death.

"YOu got it..."said weakly Nightstrike to Azure blade"now fihish your 
work..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade: What do you think? You were once a maximal, so you 
should 
> know. En garde!
> 
> An electric tendril jolted from Azure's spark and towards 
> Nightstrike's. Just as it was about to touch it, there was some 
sort 
> of short circuit that broke the contact between the two. AzureBlade 
> was now back to his full consciousness, and Night strike would 
likely 
> wake soon.
> 
> AzureBlade: Slag! I broke contact accidentally! He should wake up 
> soon, but I think we should let him go.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > Nightstrike::
> > 
> > "What do you mean with that???"asked Nightstrike who had the 
feeling

> sparks
